title: shahcompbio/nanogenome pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

bam.errorMessage: bam file for aligned reads must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

bai.errorMessage: bai file for aligned bam cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bai'

snp_vcf.errorMessage: vcf file of phased snps (optional); cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf' or '.vcf.gz'

snp_tbi.errorMessage: tbi index file for vcf (required only when vcf is provided); cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.tbi'

condition.errorMessage: specify condition (i.e., tumor or normal) and cannot contain spaces

severus_vcf.errorMessage: severus sv vcf (optional); cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.vcf' or '.vcf.gz'
